title: Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Bookcase and Shelf Desk", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Left, a bookcase with one-half showing glass door, seen in elevation. Right, isometric projection of a desk with tilting top, shown open, forming shelves. Sliding shelf at one side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Bookcase and Shelf Desk", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-487.
